title: Curtain Raiser
description: Close the reminder page for the first time.

title: Three-Day Triumph
description: Close the reminder at least once per day for 3 consecutive days.

title: Week of Willpower
description: Close the reminder at least once per day for 7 consecutive days.

title: Month of Mastery
description: Close the reminder at least once per day for 30 consecutive days.

title: Day One Detox
description: Avoid visiting the targeted site for a full 24 hours.

title: Seven-Day Serenity
description: Avoid visiting the targeted site for 7 consecutive days.

title: Thirty Days Strong
description: Avoid visiting the targeted site for 30 consecutive days.

title: Active Week
description: Interact with the app (at least one action) on 7 different days (not necessarily consecutive).

title: Monthly Momentum
description: Interact with the app on 30 different days.

title: First Week Leap
description: Reduce visits to the targeted site during a 7-day period compared to the previous 7-day period (>= 20% reduction).

title: Phoenix Return (7-day)
description: The first time you visit the targeted site after maintaining a 7-day no-visit streak. (Special event badge)

title: Phoenix Return (30-day)
description: The first time you visit the targeted site after maintaining a 30-day no-visit streak. (Special event badge)

title: The Choice Moment
description: The first time you choose "continue to site" after breaking a no-visit streak of 7 days or more. Marks a relapse event.

title: Bounceback Badge
description: After a relapse (visit following a streak), reduce weekly visits by 30% compared to the week before the relapse.
